settings.title: Spring 2023 Ready to Wear
settings.description: Utility, function, and comfort are three of fashion’s buzziest keywords, and T by Alexander Wang is offering them all this season. Riffing on last Fall’s back-to-basics ethos, Wang has evolved T’s core group of sweatshirts and knits.
